comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Prince Boris was Czar Ferdinand of Bulgaria's son. See NYT article at query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9402E0DC1F38E533A... He became King Boris III of Bulgaria after Ferdinand abdicated in 1918.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks!  We'll add the information to the source data and reload the description.

comment.author: 67908005@N02
comment._content: When adding this photo to the Clerestory Coaches (Railways) group, and as only the picture owner can do this, please kindly geotag, where possible, to identify the location, for the benefit of many of the world wide members! Many thanks.
